opis: U ponudi je prostrana kuća površine 135 m² i dodatna kamena ruševina od 28 m² s pripadajućim zemljištem od 360 m², udaljenim svega 20 m od kuće. Kuća se sastoji od: -Prizemlje: prostrani dnevni boravak, moderna kuhinja s blagovaonicom, kupaonica te garaža. -Kat: tri udobne spavaće sobe, od kojih jedna ima vlastiti balkon, kupaonica te velika zatvorena lođa s kuhinjom -Vanjski prostor: ispred kuće nalazi se kameni kamin -Mogućnost proširenja: u skladu s prostornim planom, postoji opcija podizanja krova i dobivanja dodatnog prostora u potkrovlju. Lokacija: -Kuća se nalazi u samom centru mjesta -U neposrednoj blizini su dućani (100 m) te svi važni sadržaji poput ljekarne, općine, restorana, kafića, pekare i crkve (200 m). -Najbliža plaža, jedna od najpoznatijih u okolici, udaljena je svega 10 minuta lagane šetnje i nudi brojne kafiće i restorane za uživanje. -Udaljenost od zračne luke Split (SPU) 9km, od grada Trogir 4km, od autoputa 15km Kamena ruševina 28m2 s pripadajućim zemljištem 360m2: -Prodaje se zajedno s kućom te posjeduje legalnu dokumentaciju, vlastitu adresu, pristupni put, kao i priključke za vodu, struju i kanalizaciju  odlična prilika za dodatno proširenje ili novi projekt. The offer includes a spacious house of 135 m² and an additional stone ruin of 28 m² with an associated land of 360 m², located only 20 m from the house. The house consists of: -Ground floor: spacious living room, modern kitchen with dining room, bathroom and garage. -First floor: three comfortable bedrooms, one of which has its own balcony, bathroom and large enclosed loggia with kitchen -Outdoor area: there is a stone fireplace in front of the house -Expansion possibility: in accordance with the spatial plan, there is an option to raise the roof and get additional space in the attic. Location: -The house is located in the very center of the town -In the immediate vicinity are shops (100 m) and all important facilities such as a pharmacy, municipality, restaurant, cafe, bakery and church (200 m). -The nearest beach, one of the most famous in the area, is only a 10-minute easy walk away and offers numerous cafes and restaurants to enjoy. -Distance from Split airport (SPU) 9km, from the city of Trogir 4km, from the highway 15km Stone ruin 28m2 with an adjoining land of 360m2: - It is sold together with the house and has legal documentation, its own address, access road, as well as connections for water, electricity and sewage - a great opportunity for additional expansion or a new project.
